Description.Name: Pagan
Description.Details:
Pagan Horde was one of the most celebrated Khans of Clan Burrock, and a subscriber to the so-called 'Way of the Murderpede' (whatever that is). Presiding over a golden age, Pagan greatly expanded the the power and prestige of the normally small Clan.

Pagan eventually became ilKhan of all the Clans, and one of only two Burrock Khans ever to do so, after battle simulations of an invasion of the Inner Sphere showed Burrock claiming a vast empire made of much of the Capellan Confederation, the Terran Hegemony and portions of the Federated Suns.
